Package ides.api.plugin.presentation

Interface Summary
CopyPastePresentation An interface for Presentations that implement cut, copy and paste.
GlobalFontSizePresentation An interface for Presentations that support the ability to change the font size.
Presentation The interface for a class which will render a DESModel.
Toolset The implementations of this interface provide the required GUI elements to manipulate a given type of DESModel.
UIDescriptor The descriptor of what UI elements will be available to the user when a model is activated.
ZoomablePresentation An interface for Presentations that support the ability to zoom.
 

Class Summary
ToolsetManager Manager of the Toolsets available to IDES.
 

Exception Summary
UnsupportedModelException Exception thrown when a Toolset does not support the type of DESModel passed as an argument to a method of the toolset.
